title: IndexMaker Enhanced Disclosure Document
disclaimer: This document is an operational communication and should not be regarded as a financial promotion. This document is designed for use by, and is directed only at persons resident in Switzerland.
introParagraphs: IndexMaker is required to provide information on costs and charges incurred within IndexMaker indexes to Distributors and other Intermediaries...
Intermediaries will usually have other costs relating to the services they provide...
The information provided in this document is for general information only...

costsBreakdown.title: Ongoing costs
costsBreakdown.description: All ongoing costs and charges related to the management of the index replication...

costsBreakdown.title: One-off costs
costsBreakdown.description: All costs and charges paid to index distributor at the beginning or at the end...

costsBreakdown.title: Transaction costs
costsBreakdown.description: All costs and charges incurred as a result of the acquisition and disposal...

costsBreakdown.title: Incidental costs
costsBreakdown.description: Performance fees and anything similar. IndexMaker indexes funds have no incidental costs currently.

costsBreakdown.title: Total fund costs
costsBreakdown.description: This is the total of the ongoing costs, one-off costs, transaction costs and incidental costs of minting the index.

funds.name: Symmio Top 20 A16Z Crypto VC Index

footnotes: Please note the Funds below are a sample representation of IndexMaker funds that are available. The full list of IndexMaker indexes can be found on our website www.indexmaker.global.
If you have any further questions in relation to this document please refer to IndexMaker DAO community.

risks.title: General Investment Risk
risks.description: The value of investments, and the income from them, may fall or rise...

risks.title: Currency Risk
risks.description: Some indexes invest in assets which are denominated in different currencies...

risks.title: Derivatives Risk
risks.description: The IndexMaker issuer network may use derivatives, including for investment purposes...

risks.title: Emerging Markets Risk
risks.description: Some indexes invest in emerging assets which can be more volatile than more established markets...

risks.title: Index Trading Risk
risks.description: Index shares can be bought or sold only through a broker...

risks.title: See Risk Factors
risks.description: For further information on risks please see the 'Risk Factors' section of the prospectus on our website at https://docs.indexmaker.global/risks
